attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For adults who do not want to go to university or due to commitments cannot go to be able to study for free various subjects like sign language, GCSE's either in evening classes or online.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/education-fees/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
